actions.name: Shiv
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d3 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the kobolds allies is within 5 feet of the creature and not incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Perception checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Dragons Blood
special_abilities.desc: The kobold gains resistance to the damage type of its masters breath weapon.

special_abilities.name: Ominous Shadow
special_abilities.desc: The kobold loses its Sunlight Sensitivity trait while within 60 feet of its master.
